summary: A collection of Bridgecrew integration features that extend Checkov's scanning and runner workflows. Each feature implements lifecycle hooks to incorporate platform services such as custom user policies, automated fixes, licensing validation, 3D policy checks, policy metadata enrichment, repository configuration handling, suppression application, and vulnerability data augmentation.
business_intent: To tightly couple Checkov with the Bridgecrew platform, allowing customers to enforce licensing, apply custom and advanced policies, receive remediation guidance, respect repository settings, and enrich scan results with metadata and vulnerability information, thereby delivering a more comprehensive and compliant IaC security solution.
